string.name: made_in_india_made_with_love
string.b: Made in INDIA | Made with LOVE | Made for ALL

resources.string: \"Hello there! If you enjoy the content I create or find my assistance helpful, please consider buying me a coffee. Your support will not only help me stay fueled and motivated but also enables me to continue producing valuable and insightful information. Every cup of coffee contributes to my ongoing efforts to share knowledge and make a positive impact. Your generosity is greatly appreciated, and together, we can make a difference. Thank you for being a part of this journey!\"

string.name: donate_10_text
string.b:
Scan this code in Google Pay only to donate ₹10.
Your small donation can lead to immense help to our community.

THANK YOU!
